feature: Split large analyzer.go file into separate agent files
description: The file internal/agents/analyzer.go has grown to 434 lines and contains three distinct agent types (AnalyzerAgent, DocumenterAgent, AIRulesGeneratorAgent) plus a shared AgentCreator type. This violates the single responsibility principle and makes navigation and testing difficult.

subtasks.name: Analyze analyzer.go structure
subtasks.description: Analyzed the 434-line analyzer.go file to identify three distinct agent types: AnalyzerAgent (orchestrator, lines 17-283), DocumenterAgent (README generator, lines 285-358), and AIRulesGeneratorAgent (CLAUDE.md generator, lines 360-433), plus shared AgentCreator type.
subtasks.notes: File contains three agent types that should be separated. AgentCreator is a shared function type used by AnalyzerAgent.

subtasks.name: Design file structure
subtasks.description: Design the new file structure to separate concerns while maintaining functionality.
subtasks.notes: Planned structure: analyzer.go (AnalyzerAgent only), documenter.go (DocumenterAgent), ai_rules_generator.go (AIRulesGeneratorAgent), types.go (shared types).

subtasks.name: Create types.go with shared types
subtasks.description: Create internal/agents/types.go containing AnalysisResult, FailedAnalysis, and AgentCreator types that are shared between agents.
subtasks.notes: Created types.go with three shared types extracted from analyzer.go: AnalysisResult (successful/failed analyses), FailedAnalysis (name and error), and AgentCreator (function type for creating sub-agents). File includes proper imports for config, llm, logging, and prompts packages.

subtasks.name: Create documenter.go
subtasks.description: Create internal/agents/documenter.go with DocumenterAgent type, NewDocumenterAgent constructor, and Run method.
subtasks.notes: Created internal/agents/documenter.go (88 lines) with DocumenterAgent type (lines 15-20), NewDocumenterAgent constructor (lines 22-29), and Run method (lines 31-88). File extracts lines 285-358 from analyzer.go. Includes proper imports for config, context, fmt, llm, logging, os, path/filepath, and prompts packages.

subtasks.name: Remove DocumenterAgent from analyzer.go
subtasks.description: Remove DocumenterAgent code from analyzer.go after documenter.go is created.
subtasks.notes: Removed DocumenterAgent code from analyzer.go (lines 285-358). Also removed duplicate type definitions (AnalysisResult, FailedAnalysis, AgentCreator) that were added in phase 2. analyzer.go reduced from 434 to 344 lines. Types are now referenced from types.go in the same package.

subtasks.name: Create ai_rules_generator.go
subtasks.description: Create internal/agents/ai_rules_generator.go with AIRulesGeneratorAgent type, NewAIRulesGeneratorAgent constructor, and Run method.
subtasks.notes: Created internal/agents/ai_rules_generator.go (88 lines) with AIRulesGeneratorAgent type (lines 15-20), NewAIRulesGeneratorAgent constructor (lines 22-29), and Run method (lines 31-88). File extracts lines 271-344 from analyzer.go. Includes proper imports for config, context, fmt, llm, logging, os, path/filepath, and prompts packages. Follows same pattern as documenter.go.

subtasks.name: Remove AIRulesGeneratorAgent from analyzer.go
subtasks.description: Remove AIRulesGeneratorAgent code from analyzer.go after ai_rules_generator.go is created.
subtasks.notes: Removed AIRulesGeneratorAgent code from analyzer.go (lines 271-344). Also removed unused 'os' import. analyzer.go reduced from 345 to 268 lines. AIRulesGeneratorAgent is now in its own file (ai_rules_generator.go).

subtasks.name: Update analyzer.go imports and references
subtasks.description: Ensure analyzer.go has proper imports and references types from types.go. AnalyzerAgent remains in analyzer.go with its supporting methods.
subtasks.notes: AnalyzerAgent orchestrates sub-agents (structure_analyzer, dependency_analyzer, data_flow_analyzer, request_flow_analyzer, api_analyzer). Keep createTask and processResults methods.

subtasks.name: Remove extracted code from analyzer.go
subtasks.description: Remove DocumenterAgent and AIRulesGeneratorAgent code from analyzer.go now that they're in separate files.
subtasks.notes: analyzer.go should only contain AnalyzerAgent and its methods (approximately 260 lines).
